select count(1) from tb_pm_case where device_id = #{deviceId} and case_state = 10

select tmc.*,td.device_name, tu.display_name as assignee_user_name, tu1.display_name as actual_user_name, th.hospital_name,tdm.dept_name from tb_pm_case as tmc left join tb_device as td on td.device_id = tmc.device_id left join tb_hospital as th on td.hospital_id = th.hospital_id left join tb_department as tdm on td.dept_id = tdm.dept_id left join tb_user as tu on tmc.assignee_user_id = tu.user_id left join tb_user as tu1 on tmc.actual_pm_user_id = tu1.user_id where tmc.case_id = #{caseId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_pm_case ( case_subject, case_remark, case_state, device_id, assignee_user_id, plan_pm_time, actual_pm_time, actual_pm_user_id, accessory_info, pm_file, remark, create_time, creater, modify_time, modifier ) values ( #{caseSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, null, null, to_timestamp(#{actualTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{actualUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accessoryInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pmFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: select tr.role_name from tr_user_role as tur inner join tb_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tur.user_id = #{userId}
select tur.user_id from tr_user_role as tur inner join tb_role as tr on tur.role_id = tr.role_id where tr.role_name = #{roleName}
